mapper.select: select * from foodtable F JOIN ( SELECT R_PRODUCTNO, AVG(STARSCORE) AS AVG_SCORE, COUNT(*) AS REVIEW_COUNT FROM REVIEWTABLE GROUP BY R_PRODUCTNO )R ON F.NO = R.R_PRODUCTNO where (productname LIKE '%${foodname}%') OR (company LIKE '%${foodname}%') ORDER by R.AVG_SCORE DESC,imgurl ASC
